title: 3cm Hunter - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Mystery   Psychological   Sci-fi   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: J. Robin   제이로빈
description:
Kang Baek-hyun went to buy tteokbokki (spicy rice cakes) for his sister when, suddenly, his body shrinks to 3 centimeters!

In fact, the entire human race has shrunk as well. Now the once harmless cats, sparrows, ants, and even robot cleaners become life-threatening. Mankind is in great chaos, but each person receives a gift to escape this crisis. Along with the ability to see their “status windows,” they are given mysterious powers.

In a world of despair, Baek-hyun must live on in order to protect his sister and save his friends.>
